description: A small cardboard box, with a sticker on the side indicating it once held 7.92x33mm ammo.
//: ~ 5x6x3 cm = 90 ml = 126 cm2. I've seen pictures of these holding 15 rounds each

description: A small cardboard box, with a sticker on the side indicating it once held three loaded stripper clips, five 7.92x33mm cartridges each.
//: ~ 6x9x4 cm = 108 ml, these held 15 rounds total with three stripper clips

description: A practical application of Lunarian technology, this trapezoidal box enables synchronizing a fixed volume of liquid in order to carry it around.  The liquid holds the overall shape the user gives to it, meaning the it can be carried inside a backpack, or carrying it externally by clipping the device to the belt.  It also automatically protects the purity of what's being currently held, by impeding it from mixing with anything else.
A purple, hand-sized sphere of a reflective material.  Touching it makes you feel funny, and you have this idea in your mind that these things may carry useful stuff inside.
//: This should be destroyed after looting, or be rendered unusable, or become super heavy so it's basically useless
